title: Researchers Uncover Batavia Windows Spyware Stealing Documents from Russian Firms
description: Russian organizations have been targeted as part of an ongoing campaign that delivers a previously undocumented Windows spyware called Batavia. The activity, per cybersecurity vendor Kaspersky, has been active since July 2024.
